code: import axios from"axios";import request from"./path.json";var getData=function getData(cityName){return axios.get(request.apiCall+request.query+cityName+request.API_KEY);};var getCityPageData=function getCityPageData(lon,lat){return axios.get(request.dailyCall+"lat="+lat+"&lon="+lon+request.daily+request.API_KEY);};var requests={getData:getData,getCityPageData:getCityPageData};export default requests;
